subSections.title: Glyph origin
Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[go out]]
#: {{zh-ant|入}}
# to [[leave]]; to [[exit]]
# to [[appear]]
# to [[show up]]
# to [[send out]]; to [[put]] [[forth]]
# to [[offer]]
# to [[exceed]]
# to be in [[excess]]
# to [[produce]]
# to [[happen]]
# to [[publish]]
# to [[vent]]
# to [[sell]] (one's own thing)
# to be released (e.g., a product, film, or announcement)
#: {{zh-x|@Windows 10 已經 出 咗 一年|Windows 10 has already been '''out''' for a year|C}}
# {{n-g|Particle placed after verbs to indicate an outward movement.}}
# {{n-g|Particle placed after verbs to indicate a completed action.}}

subSections.title: Readings
Noun
Derived terms
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|しゅつ}}

From {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=しゅつ|-}} {{ltc-l|出|to go or come out|id=2}}.

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ず}}
Contraction of verb {{m|ja|出ず|tr=izu||to go or come out|pos=obsolete}}

subSections.title: Verb
subSections.text:
{{ja-verb|type=ni|ず|hhira=づ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=す'|obsolete}} to go or come out

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{m|ja|出る|tr=deru}} form is now the standard term for this in modern Japanese.
